data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Teacher: And how about you, Frankie? Do ____ have ____ thoughts ____ the ____?
Frankie: Umm, I ____ the ____ was ____.
Teacher: Can ____ be ____ specific? For ____, ____ you ____ the ____ were ____ in a creative ____?
Frankie: Yeah, I ____ so. I liked all the battle scenes.
data.partBlankContent:
Teacher: And how about you, Frankie? Do y__ have a__ thoughts o_ the rea____?
Frankie: Umm, I gu___ the wri____ was o_.
Teacher: Can y__ be mo__ specific? For exa____, d__ you th___ the chara_____ were desc_____ in a creative w__?
Frankie: Yeah, I gu___ so. I liked all the battle scenes.
data.fullContent: Teacher: And how about you, Frankie? Do you have any thoughts of the reading? Frankie: Umm, I guess the writing was ok. Teacher: Can you be more specific? For example, did you think the characters were described in a creative way? Frankie: Yeah, I guess so. I liked all the battle scenes.
data.answer: 老师：那你呢，弗兰基？你对阅读有什么想法吗？ 弗兰基：嗯，我想写作还可以吧。 老师：你能说得更具体些吗？举个例子，你认为角色的描述有创意吗？ 弗兰基：是的，我想是的。我喜欢所有的战斗场面。
